bossDialog: How bold of you to seek me out. I welcome your challenge. Let us fight...
My blade, your wit. Which shall be found to be sharper?
You've got some nerve challenging the likes of I.

cardBonuses.2: Your creatures gain 10% more Maximum {STAT_health} from stat-boosting effects.

cardBonuses.6: Your creatures gain 10% more Maximum {STAT_health} from stat-boosting effects.

master.dialog: Kolosses are absolute meat tanks. They can take a serious spanking, and even dish one out if you provoke them enough! Allow me to demonstrate!
master.name: Umbri

name: Koloss
